sentences.english: HERBA HOUTTYNIAE mainly depended on wild resources.
sentences.chinese: 魚腥草長期以來主要依靠採挖野生資源。

sentences.english: The present invention relates to a kind of cordate houttuynia preparation and its preparation process.
sentences.chinese: 本發明涉及一種魚腥草製劑及製備方法。

sentences.english: To study the productive technology of extracting flavonoids from Houttuynia cordata Thunb.
sentences.chinese: 研究了從魚腥草中提取黃酮的生產工藝。

sentences.english: Flavonoids in Cordate houttuynia exerted obvious antidepressant activity.
sentences.chinese: 表明魚腥草黃酮有明顯的抗抑鬱活性。

sentences.english: The effect of different forms of lead on Houttuynia cordata Thunb absorbing lead.
sentences.chinese: 自然狀態下鉛在魚腥草體內的分佈。

definition: dodder (Cuscuta sinensis, a parasitic vine with seeds used in medicine)
mole cricket/Gryllolaptaptidae, family of burrowing insects of order Orthoptera (a serious agricultural pest)
King Solomon's seal (plant of genus Polygonatum)
to mash/to beat to a pulp
liquorice (Sophora flavescens), with roots used in TCM
to relieve (cold, rheumatic pain etc)/lit. to dispel pathogenic wind (TCM)
